name: Star Duel
description:
A simple two player space dueling game. Uses joysticks or keyboard controls. It has some configurable gameplay options:

  • Ridiculously fast rapid-fire
  • Torpedos do extra damage
  • Unlimited ship speed
    • Background image from https://www.pexels.com/photo/starry-sky-998641/
    Sounds and music from https://freesound.org/people/LittleRobotSoundFactory/
    Pixel art hand-drawn
